tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Mac is prosecuting a SEAL jumpmaster charged with causing the death of one of his men during a parachute insertion exercise.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Real Deal Seal
programme.desc: Medal of Honor Navy SEAL Lt. Curtis Rivers is court-martialed for punching a Congressional candidate who claims to be a Navy SEAL.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Overdue And Presumed Lost
programme.desc: A salvage company tries to claim rights to the wreckage of the USS Dolphin, a WW2 submarine that was lost the day before the attack on Pearl Harbor in 1941.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: Louis Cellucci is having a rough time aboard the flight deck of the USS Benjamin Harrison. Moments after he walks away from another failed attempt at fixing an F-14, shouts of Man Overboard! are heard across the deck.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Walk on Wings
programme.desc: Congresswoman Latham and a colleague watch four marine jumpers jump into the ocean from an M22 Osprey. With two marines left to jump, the plane is struck by a swell in the ocean. Harm and Mac are instructed to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Lie in the Sand
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Northeast Africa where they must carefully navigate a minefield in order to save the lives of local villagers.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Pilot
programme.desc: When a crisis at LAX leaves dozens of airplanes unable to land, the government enlists a team of misfit geniuses to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Single Point of Failure
programme.desc: The Governor calls on Team Scorpion when his daughter is mysteriously "bio-hacked" with a deadly virus and has only 24 hours to live.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Cyclone
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is determined to prove their worth when a bomber threatens to take out the internet infrastructure of the entire Southwest.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 1
programme.desc: Yvette and the MH team travel to the oldest pub in Macclesfield, famous for ghost stories and strange occurrences. Whatever is there makes itself known quickly and violently.(n)

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to investigate Macclesfield’s oldest pub and are soon under fire from poltergeist activity. Glen’s scepticism is put fully to the test.(n)

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 1
programme.desc: The upper room of the Leopard Inn are now a set of deserted rooms and corridors that were once a Victorian Hotel, although way past its heyday some of the borders seem to have stayed. This episode sees the team get their most convincing evidence to date.(n)

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 2
programme.desc: The team continue in the abandoned old hotel but something seems to be stalking them. Yvette has a close encounter alone in the corridors with disembodied footsteps walking toward her and aggressive poltergeist activity plagues the rest of the team.(n)

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 3
programme.desc: In the final part of their investigation into the abandoned old hotel above the Leopard Inn, Yvette and her team are tested again to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.sub-title: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Amy is back! TAPS travels to Shreveport, Louisiana to investigate the historic Shreveport Auditorium, a place famous for introducing Elvis and other rock n' rolls stars to the world.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Nine Men's Misery
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Cumberland Library & Monastery in Cumberland, Rhode Island where \\"the practice of silence\\" has been disturbed by a brutal past.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Coroner's Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Shreveport, Louisiana where the employees and owner of the Rendall Building are experiencing terrifying paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.246
programme.desc: Racial slurs and violent threats emerge as a woman and her father sue a family member for incomplete home renovations. Meanwhile, friends swap cell phones, but a defective device complicates the arrangement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.133
programme.desc: Woman sues ex-friend for damaging Pontiac Grand Prix she was selling; ex-friend countersues for car payments. Parents fight over sick child's medication; neighbor testifies helping administer meds.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.49
programme.desc: A teenager is accused of spitting in the face of and taunting another teenager; an angry mother sues after allegedly false charges of assault and battery are filed against her son.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.254
programme.desc: A teenager sues her sister for a loan to pay car insurance and credit card charges. A man demands payment for an Oldsmobile Alero repossessed by his ex-girlfriend. Another teen sues an ex-friend for assault during an argument over missing property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.43
programme.desc: Teenager steals mother's checkbook, buys car; parents sue custom shop owner/Woman sues ex-lover for leaving her for mother of his child; he claims bitterness, she alleges owed money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.150
programme.desc: Man denies owing ex and her mother for car down payment. Accuses ex-lover of sending inappropriate emails about sex to his new girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.63
programme.desc: Woman locks daughter out, sues for unpaid rent; daughter countersues for damages citing illegal eviction. Man denies owing ex-girlfriend for uninsured motorcycle he totaled, despite $17,000 pay-off amount left on co-signed vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.101
programme.desc: Former best friends fight over utility bills, protective orders and alleged harassment/A man sues his child’s former best friend for the cost to haul her stuff away and for filing a restraining order.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.176
programme.desc: Single mother bails Internet acquaintance out of jail, discovers he has girlfriend and baby. He countersues, alleging she stalked him. Angry neighbor smashes deliveryman's car window with lawn chair for driving too fast.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.237
programme.desc: A 'doctored' contract complicates a case about a ruined wedding reception due to heat. Feuding teenagers and parents battle over liability in a wrecked car incident after a night of drinking.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the first challenge, the final six chefs break through a case, retrieving a random ingredient they will have to cook with. The second challenge has each chef cooking with the same four ingredients. The third challenge is a surf and turf challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twelve aspiring restaurateurs compete before chef Gordon Ramsay as he works to open a world-class restaurant in Los Angeles and discover the country's next culinary star.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After barely making it through opening night, the contestants feel the pressure as they prepare for their second dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants prepare for their third dinner service and chef Ramsay selects another contestant to leave Hell's Kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay puts aside the battle of the sexes and switches the chefs to even out the teams. The teams are put to the test during a lunch service cooking for a group of highly demanding customers.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: On the restaurant's fifth night, Chef Gordon Ramsay has the contestants make and serve an entire Italian-themed menu.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.(n)

programme.title: StarCrash
programme.desc: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn. (1978) Starring: Marjoe Gortner, David Hasselhoff, Caroline Munro, Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.(n)

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: Bolo
programme.desc: Two convicts get freed from prison and become lawmen in a corrupt village.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: A Beauty And The Beast Christmas
programme.desc: Social Media influencer Ginger Holiday is convinced by her agent to fake a romance with viral bad boy Beau Bradley to gain more followers. Initially they can't stand each other but the feelings they had to fake might just be turning into something real.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Harmony
programme.desc: Harmony's pop star boyfriend breaks up with her right before the holiday season, but when she returns to her hometown she discovers the heart and music that her life has been missing.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Starring Matthew Knight and Chris Kattan. Three children and their father move from California to Canada. When they go shopping at the mall, they find counterfeit cash, inadvertently help catch crooks, and make a discovery about Santa.(n)

programme.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
programme.desc: Starring Dani Kind and Michelle Stafford. When Dawna Williams' college-aged daughter goes missing, she investigates her daughter's disappearance herself, unaware that her biggest supporter is also the man who may have murdered her child.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Haven't We Met Before
programme.desc: After attempting to murder a woman he's convinced tried to kill him in a past life, a man is committed to a hospital for the criminally insane, but a suspicious District Attorney is convinced that the man has killed before.(n)

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: As a teenage girl, Laura witnessed the arrest of her father, a brilliant hacker. As an adult, Laura has become a hacker to assist in national security.(n)

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An edge-of-your-seat espionage thriller, starring Richard Gere and Topher Grace as ex-CIA and FBI agents, trying to find the killer of a US senator, which bears the hallmark of an infamous Soviet assassin, thought to be dead.(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.(n)

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: A reclusive Englishwoman opens her heart to a young evacuee as World War II rages across the channel.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Newly arrived gunslinger Al Walker throws a mammoth party at the saloon, keeping acting Marshall Ben Waller busy until Lucas is forced to intervene.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Lucas accuses a newspaper writer's misleading articles of causing an innocent man's death, the writer begins writing articles about Lucas.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gavin and Ezra Martin think that Lucas killed their son Clemmie while taking part in a train robbery and Lucas refuses to tell them what really happened.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Eddie's daughter causes trouble for Lucas when two strangers threaten her life after she arrives with criminal information and stolen money.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Town character Brett Conway blackmails Lucas with the knowledge that a young couple Lucas rescued is suffering from yellow fever.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are stranded in the middle of a desert with very little food or water, and after Lucas is injured, Mark becomes the only hope for their survival.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A dance hall singer asks Lucas to care for her daughter in an effort to hide the baby from her self-righteous, bigoted father.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark runs away from home after his father questions his story about overhearing a plot to rob the bank.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a stranger arrives to marry the town spinster, two brothers who want her land try to discourage him with threats and a beating.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 2
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage won't save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: Struck By Lightning
programme.desc: Carson Phillips is put in charge of publishing a school paper, but his fellow students aren't so keen to help. When he discovers a lot of the popular kids are keeping secrets, he decides to blackmail them in to helping him - what could possibly go wrong?(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Gold Diggers
programme.desc: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.(n)

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: The discovery of a dying man by two students at Russell Square tube station triggers a hunt for cannibals preying on passengers.(n)

programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: A wealthy hunter invites a group of people to his fortified mansion hoping to trap the werewolf among them.(n)

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: A glamour model helps Scotland Yard to catch a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: Take My Life
programme.desc: When her husband is wrongly accused of murder, an opera singer sets out to find the real culprit.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Technology
programme.desc: An old box of Pearadyne Lab computer chips leads Marshall into a moneymaking scheme, but he's accused of cheating. Also the students of Blake Holsey go cellphone and texting crazy.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Equation
programme.desc: The Academic Olympics team trains under Capt. Corrine (who is obsessed with winning). Josie, Lucas, Marshall, and Vaughn must figure out why they are doing things they normally couldn't or shouldn't be doing.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Hemispheres
programme.desc: When Corrine auditions for a band as a singer, she looks at a mirror, through which she travels. To return, Corrine must learn to use the creative half of her brain without losing her ability to use her logical side.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Nutrition
programme.desc: Students are becoming addicted to energy bars, especially Lucas and Vaughn, who aren't willing to give them up. The others must attempt to save them when it is discovered they contain zero calories or energy, thus weakening the addicts.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Dark and Stormy Night (REDUX)
programme.desc: Darius reconciles with Luc, while making peace with Dante, but the sinister forces that follow him are not far behind.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Supermax (REDUX)
programme.desc: After Rudolpho sells the Tulip out from under them, the crew scheme to take it back from the new owner, who wants to turn the ship into a maximum security prison.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Twist in Time (REDUX)
programme.desc: While transporting an insane convict named "Five," Dante diverts course to answer a distress call from a graviton research station on Triton, which is experimenting with the distortion of space and time.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: In the exciting season opener, the surviving members of Mutant X emerge from a deadly explosion to meet Lexa, who makes them begin to question fundamental assumptions about their world.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team must stop the auction of a highly lethal substance that a number of notorious international terrorists are vying to acquire.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team is brought in to help a military base that has become infected with a deadly disease.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team must stop a serial killer who leaves clues to his next victims in the form of puzzles.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Highjacked
programme.desc: With a reporter on board, the Taelon mother ship is highjacked into interdimensional space. Liam is the prime suspect, causing an even bigger rift between Da'an and Zo'or. As the ship floats, lost in space, they must find the real culprit.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Defector
programme.desc: A shuttle crashes on a beach after being pursued by a second Taelon piloted shuttle. When Liam locates the survivor (a Taelon called Belleye), he claims to want to help the Resistance take back Earth from the Taelons.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)
